caption: Omg, their Detroit style pizza is amazing. Just tried the cheese and chicken pesto and both were delicious. The chicken pesto was bursting with flavor. Everything I’ve had at Chef Tony’s has been amazing over the years.

Chef Tony has outdone himself with this delicious pizza! Not only did it remind of the thick crust pizza my grandfather from Italy made, but the flavor was spectacular! He raised the bar on pizza for the area 👏👏👏

This. Pizza. Is. Freaking. Insaneee. My top two faves are definitely the Hemi Original and The Roasted Chicken Pesto. The Hemi Original has such great crunch and soft or pillow like texture inside, I’m no chef but it’s definitely butter instead of oil on the bottom of the crust, the roasted chicken pesto is just phenomenal period.

Wow, what a pizza, the dough has the right amount of crispness and pillowy, sauce bright red and flavorful also the right amount, can’t wait to go back this weekend, I’m about 30 minutes away but it’s worth the drive and more, keep up those heavenly pizzas guys!

This is honestly the best pizza I’ve tried and anyone who hasn’t checked it out is genuinely missing out on a gem. Great pizza quality and the type of food where you can’t talk while eating because you need another bite good 100%.
HEMI Pizza was Amazing !!! 🔥🔥🔥  Crust is so buttery with the perfect crunch !!!

Chef Tony’s HEMI brand Detroit-style pizza was a revelation; his pies deftly balance crunchy, buttery crust with creamy block cheese and a streak of herb-laced, homemade  sauce on top. The cup pepperonis also introduced a new (to me) twist on the traditional pizza topping. Just plain delicious.

Chef Tony’s Hemi pizza is delicious. When I told my mouth we were ordering it again this weekend, my tastebuds stood up and cheered! It’s just the right amount of crunch, cheesy, buttery goodness and sauce. You can taste their love of cooking in each bite. Search no further and enjoy. The best. Period.

We love HEMI pizza...the crust is buttery like a focaccia, with a thick layer of brick cheese and a perfectly garlicky sauce with bright tomato flavor. Bethesda needed a new pizza option, and this is different than your standard pizza. Definitely give it a try, it’s delicious!
